value.name: Baton Rouge Cops Will Not Face Disciplinary Charges for Strip-Searching a Minor in Public
value.description: Days after an exclusive report by Reason, the Baton Rouge Police Department (BRPD) on Friday defended a traffic stop during which time five officers strip-searched a minor in public in January of last year because the cops allegedly smelled marijuana.

value.name: Man who was shot to death Saturday night on Williamsburg Road is identified
value.description: A man who was shot to death Saturday night outside an apartment along Williamsburg Road has been identified by Richmond police as Scott Johnson II.

value.name: Father and former Henrico football standout murdered while helping a friend, family says
value.description: Scott Johnson II, affectionately known as Scottie, was a football standout at Highland Springs. He was also a devoted brother, son and a new father.

value.name: Memorial Day expected to bring thousands of boaters, paddlers to Palm Beach County waters
value.description: Law enforcement expects a boisterous crowd over the three-day Memorial Day weekend in Palm Beach County, home to about 40,000 registered boats.

value.name: George Floyd’s death sparks changes, debate surrounding policing
value.description: Tuesday marks one year since the death of George Floyd at the hands of Minneapolis police. Floyd’s death sparked a nationwide movement to change police tactics and increase accountability, but the movement has brought different results in different parts of the country.

value.name: POLICE RECOGNISE INTERNATIONAL DAY AGAINST HOMOPHOBIA, BIPHOBIA AND TRANSPHOBIA
value.description: Hampshire Constabulary is today (Monday) recognising International Day against Homophobia, Biphobia and Transphobia (IDAHOBIT). The date marking IDAHOBIT was originally selected to commemorate the decision to remove homosexuality from the International Classification of Diseases from the World Health Organisation on 17th May 1990.
